abstract: Health care is at a turning point. We are shifting from protocolized medicine to precision medicine, and digital health systems are facilitating this shift. By providing clinicians with detailed information for each patient and analytic support for decision …

title: Understanding predictions of drug effectiveness using explainable Machine Learning models
abstract: Purpose: The analysis of absorption, distribution, metabolism, and excretion (ADME) molecular properties is of relevance to drug design, as they directly inﬂuence the drug's eﬀectiveness at its target location. This study concerns their prediction, using …
